about_the_game:
Anime DLC include 8 beautiful anime style female characters in skimpy revealing outfits ready for having sex in your game. You can make them completely naked or partially dressed. You can use them as main characters, give them orders where they should go and what they have to do. You will decide with whom those cute girls will have sex today.

Discover what else can offer you this cool DLC and have a fun.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the Play mode you can replace main character on scene.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

All characters included in this DLC are 18+

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC characters are completely naked and have working genitals.

name: Anime for Cyberpunk sex

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Anime for Cyberpunk sex - additional beautiful anime style female characters ready for having sex in your game in skimpy revealing outfits
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
